title: Rio Tinto Copper Output Climbs as Oyu Tolgoi Mine Ramps Up
description: Rio Tinto Group’s copper production climbed 5% in the fourth quarter thanks to the expansion of underground operations at Oyu Tolgoi in Mongolia, while its core Pilbara iron ore mines hit a record in the last three months of the year.
content: Rio Tinto Group’s copper production climbed 5% in the fourth quarter thanks to the expansion of underground operations at Oyu Tolgoi in Mongolia, while its core Pilbara iron ore mines hit a record in the last three months of the year.
